import React,{useState}from'react';import{Share}from'@capacitor/share';import{LocalNotifications}from'@capacitor/local-notifications';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[yearOfBirth,setYearOfBirth]=useState('');const[age,setAge]=useState(null);const calculateAge=()=>{const currentYear=new Date().getFullYear();const calculatedAge=currentYear-parseInt(yearOfBirth);setAge(calculatedAge);// Gửi thông báo cục bộ
LocalNotifications.schedule({notifications:[{title:'Kết quả tính tuổi',body:`Bạn ${calculatedAge} tuổi!`,id:1,schedule:{at:new Date(Date.now()+1000)}}]});};const shareResult=async()=>{if(age!==null){await Share.share({title:'Kết quả tính tuổi',text:`Tôi ${age} tuổi!`,dialogTitle:'Chia sẻ kết quả'});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{textAlign:'center',padding:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\u1EE8ng d\u1EE5ng t\xEDnh tu\u1ED5i"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Nh\u1EADp n\u0103m sinh",value:yearOfBirth,onChange:e=>setYearOfBirth(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:calculateAge,children:"T\xEDnh tu\u1ED5i"}),age!==null&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["B\u1EA1n ",age," tu\u1ED5i."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:shareResult,children:"Chia s\u1EBB k\u1EBFt qu\u1EA3"})]})]});}export default App;
